headline: Indian yarn maker Trident posts quarterly profit slump as exports soften
summary: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Indian towel and bedsheet maker Trident reported a 44% fall in profit on Monday, as a U.S. tariff-triggered slowdown in exports squeezed sales during the third quarter.

content.title: Indian yarn maker Trident posts quarterly profit slump as exports soften

headline: Target’s Big Spring Beauty Reset Puts Store Traffic And Valuation In Focus
summary: Target, NYSE:TGT, has rolled out its largest Spring beauty assortment to date alongside a refreshed in store beauty experience. The update includes new and expanded brands, broader product lines, and interactive beauty events aimed at drawing shoppers back into stores. The launch comes as the company works to address recent customer dissatisfaction and softer store traffic. Target shares recently closed at $115.55, with the stock up 5.5% over the past week, 9.5% over the past month, and...
